monsters_data.name: sinscale
monsters_data.sensor_text: Just take out the ones in front. They launch Spines soon after their wings start to flicker.

monsters_data.name: sinspawn ammes
monsters_data.sensor_text: Unleashes Demi when its HP is reduced by 1/4.

monsters_data.name: tanker
monsters_data.sensor_text: Dangling off the edge of the highway.

monsters_data.name: geosgaeno
monsters_data.sensor_text: Covered with thick scales. Vulnerable to magic.

monsters_data.name: piranha x1
monsters_data.sensor_text: Low attack and HP.
monsters_data.scan_text: Attacks by biting. Low HP and strength. It should be an easy enemy to handle.

monsters_data.name: piranha x2
monsters_data.sensor_text: Attacks in packs of two.
monsters_data.scan_text: Attacks by biting. Both HP and attack power are higher when they appear in pairs.

monsters_data.name: piranha x3
monsters_data.sensor_text: Attacks in packs of three.
monsters_data.scan_text: Attacks by biting. Both HP and attack power are higher when they appear in groups of three.

monsters_data.name: tros
monsters_data.sensor_text: Attacks with Nautilus Charge after backing away.
monsters_data.scan_text: Retreats behind the column after taking damage, where it cannot be attacked. Hits all targets with Nautilus Charge on the next turn, inflicting great damage. Use trigger commands to stop it from unleashing Nautilus Charge.

altered_states.condition: After 'Nautilus Charge', or when you flank it.

monsters_data.name: condor
monsters_data.sensor_text: Aerial. Magic attacks are the way to go.
monsters_data.scan_text: Aerial and hard to hit. Have Wakka shoot it down or let Lulu toast it with Fire.

monsters_data.name: dingo
monsters_data.sensor_text: Very nimble. Resistant to magic.
monsters_data.scan_text: Very nimble and hard to hit. High magic defense. Must defeat it quickly or be attacked. Have Tidus beat it pronto.

monsters_data.name: water flan
monsters_data.sensor_text: Water elemental. Vulnerable to opposing element. Resistant to physical attacks.
monsters_data.scan_text: Water-based. So soft, it’s hard to damage physically. Weak against lightning, so blast it with Lulu’s Thunder spell. Don’t use Water or it will recover HP.

monsters_data.name: garuda
monsters_data.sensor_text: Dodging its attacks is easier after inflicting darkness.
monsters_data.scan_text: It has high strength and tons of HP. Beware of Sonic Boom, which hits all characters. Dodge its attacks more easily by inflicting darkness.

monsters_data.name: condor
monsters_data.sensor_text: Aerial. Magic attacks are the way to go.
monsters_data.scan_text: Aerial and hard to hit. Use Wakka’s attack to knock it down. It’s vulnerable to fire, so you can also use Lulu’s Fire spell.

monsters_data.name: dingo
monsters_data.sensor_text: Very nimble. Resistant to magic.
monsters_data.scan_text: Very nimble and hard to hit. Magic defense is also high. Try to defeat it quickly to avoid damage. Attack swiftly with Tidus.

monsters_data.name: water flan
monsters_data.sensor_text: Water elemental. Vulnerable to opposing element. Resistant to physical attacks.
monsters_data.scan_text: Water-based. So soft, it’s hard to damage physically. Weak against lightning, so blast it with Lulu’s Thunder spell. Don’t use Water or it will recover HP.

monsters_data.name: sin fin
monsters_data.sensor_text: Attack with magic and Wakka’s ball.
monsters_data.scan_text: Save Kilika! Hit Sin from a distance with Wakka’s blitzball and Lulu’s black magic. Valefor’s attacks work well, too.

monsters_data.name: sinscale
monsters_data.sensor_text: They just keep coming.
monsters_data.scan_text: Launched from Sin’s body. They unleash Spines once their wings flicker, so dispatch them quickly.

monsters_data.name: sinspawn echuilles
monsters_data.sensor_text: Afflict it with darkness to make it miss.
monsters_data.scan_text: Absorbs HP with its Drain Touch. Inflicting darkness is the way to go. But after two Drain Touches it will bring out the Blender, inflicting damage on all targets.

monsters_data.name: sinscale
monsters_data.sensor_text: They just keep coming.
monsters_data.scan_text: Disappears after each attack, but more keep coming with no end in sight.

monsters_data.name: ragora
monsters_data.sensor_text: Vulnerable to fire.
monsters_data.scan_text: Beware the powerful Seed Cannon. It can KO in a single shot. Most plant fiends burn easily, so have Lulu cast Fira. Kimahri can learn Seed Cannon.

monsters_data.name: dinonix
monsters_data.sensor_text: Very nimble. Resistant to magic.
monsters_data.scan_text: Very nimble and hard to hit. Magic defense is also high. Defeat it quickly to avoid damage. Vulnerable to ice.

monsters_data.name: killer bee
monsters_data.sensor_text: Aerial. Vulnerable to ice. Watch out for poison.
monsters_data.scan_text: Aerial and hard to hit. Use Wakka’s attack to knock it down. It’s vulnerable to ice, so Blizzard is also effective. Attacks may inflict poison.

monsters_data.name: ragora
monsters_data.sensor_text: Vulnerable to fire.
monsters_data.scan_text: Watch out for its powerful Seed Cannon. One bad hit will knock characters out. Plants tend to be weak against fire, so have Lulu cast Fira. Kimahri can learn Seed Cannon.

monsters_data.name: yellow element
monsters_data.sensor_text: Lightning elemental. Vulnerable to opposing element.
monsters_data.scan_text: Casts Thunder. Physical attacks hardly hurt it. Absorbs lightning, so Water is the way to go.

monsters_data.name: lord ochu
monsters_data.sensor_text: Vulnerable to fire.
monsters_data.scan_text: Its claws inflict poison. Restores lost HP by sleeping. Retaliates with Earthquake if awakened, so watch out. Being a plant, it burns easily.

monsters_data.name: sinspawn geneaux
monsters_data.sensor_text: Vulnerable to magic.
monsters_data.scan_text: Its shell deflects physical attacks well. Tentacles absorb magic attacks. Defeat tentacles first, then force it from its shell with fire magic. Absorbs water-based attacks.

altered_states.condition: When leaving its shell after taking 600 HP worth of damage.

monsters_data.name: worker
monsters_data.sensor_text: Vulnerable to lightning.
monsters_data.scan_text: Ancient machina restored by the Al Bhed. Not a war machine, but hits hard with its tool arm. Vulnerable to lightning, so Thunder is the way to go.

monsters_data.name: oblitzerator
monsters_data.sensor_text: Vulnerable to lightning.
monsters_data.scan_text: Speeds up when damaged. Vulnerable to lightning, but chucks a Mute Ball at anyone casting Thunder. Use a nearby object to escape its mighty Blitzball Rush.

monsters_data.name: crane
monsters_data.sensor_text: Electric motor.

monsters_data.name: sahagin chief
monsters_data.sensor_text: Vulnerable to lightning.
monsters_data.scan_text: Nimble, but has low HP and strength. Just one is nothing to write home about. Vulnerable to lightning, darkness, and sleep.

monsters_data.name: garuda
monsters_data.sensor_text: Dodging its attacks is easier after inflicting darkness.
monsters_data.scan_text: It has high strength and tons of HP. Beware of Sonic Boom, which hits all characters. Dodge its attacks more easily by inflicting darkness.

monsters_data.name: raldo
monsters_data.sensor_text: Covered by a hard shell. Piercing weapons are the way to go.
monsters_data.scan_text: Covered by a hard shell. Slow-moving, but has high physical and magic defense. Vulnerable to ice. Falls easily to piercing weapons. Have Auron slice it down the middle.

monsters_data.name: bomb
monsters_data.sensor_text: Retaliates with Self-Destruct when attacked three times.
monsters_data.scan_text: Retaliates with Self-Destruct against whoever attacks it a third time. Use NulBlaze if you can’t defeat it before then. Vulnerable to ice, so use Blizzard. Kimahri can learn Self-Destruct.

monsters_data.name: dual horn
monsters_data.sensor_text: Inflict darkness to evade its attacks.
monsters_data.scan_text: Its Gore is powerful, but inflict darkness or use Sleep Attack to avoid it easily. Kimahri can learn Fire Breath.

monsters_data.name: floating eye
monsters_data.sensor_text: Aerial. Resistant to magic.
monsters_data.scan_text: Aerial and hard to hit. Its weakness is lightning, but it has high magic defense. Use Wakka’s attack to defeat it.

monsters_data.name: ipiria
monsters_data.sensor_text: Very nimble. Resistant to magic.
monsters_data.scan_text: Very nimble and hard to hit. Magic defense is also high. Defeat it quickly to avoid damage. Takes only half damage from  fire, but vulnerable to ice.

monsters_data.name: mi'ihen fang
monsters_data.sensor_text: Very nimble. Resistant to magic.
monsters_data.scan_text: Very nimble and hard to hit. Magic defense is also high. It’s vulnerable to fire- and water-based attacks, so use weapons with these elements to inflict greater damage.

monsters_data.name: raldo
monsters_data.sensor_text: Covered by a hard shell. Piercing weapons are the way to go.
monsters_data.scan_text: Covered by a hard shell. Slow-moving, but has high physical and magic defense. Vulnerable to ice. Falls easily to piercing weapons. Have Auron slice it down the middle.

monsters_data.name: vouivre
monsters_data.sensor_text: Covered with hard scales. Piercing weapons are the way to go.
monsters_data.scan_text: Covered with hard scales, but piercing weapons can easily defeat it. Physical and magic defense are high, but it’s weak against ice. Watch out for its Breath, which hits all.

monsters_data.name: white element
monsters_data.sensor_text: Ice elemental. Vulnerable to opposing element.
monsters_data.scan_text: Casts Blizzard. Physical attacks hardly hurt it. Absorbs ice, so Fire is the way to go.

monsters_data.name: chocobo eater
monsters_data.sensor_text: Vulnerable to darkness.
monsters_data.scan_text: Stick with piercing weapons until you knock him over. After he says ”You’re next!” he’ll unleash a powerful attack. Casts Blizzard when HP is low, so stay warm with NulFrost.

monsters_data.name: funguar
monsters_data.sensor_text: Occasionally counters with Pollen, which induces sleep.
monsters_data.scan_text: Casts Fire, so it’s best to silence it. Occasionally retaliates with sleep-inducing Pollen. Putting it to sleep is effective. Vulnerable to fire.

monsters_data.name: gandarewa
monsters_data.sensor_text: Aerial. Resistant to magic.
monsters_data.scan_text: Aerial and hard to hit. Casts Thunder. It’s vulnerable to water, but has high magic defense. Use Wakka to knock it out of the sky.

monsters_data.name: garuda
monsters_data.sensor_text: Dodging its attacks is easier after inflicting darkness.
monsters_data.scan_text: It has high strength and tons of HP. Beware of Sonic Boom, which hits all characters. Dodge its attacks more easily by inflicting darkness.

monsters_data.name: lamashtu
monsters_data.sensor_text: Covered with hard scales. Piercing weapons are the way to go.
monsters_data.scan_text: Covered with hard scales. Physical and magic defense are high, but it’s weak against fire. Its attack may cause slow. Watch out for its ice-based Breath, which hits all.

monsters_data.name: raptor
monsters_data.sensor_text: Very nimble. Resistant to magic.
monsters_data.scan_text: Very nimble and hard to hit. Magic defense is also high. Defeat it quickly to avoid damage. Takes only half damage from fire and lightning, but is vulnerable to ice.

monsters_data.name: red element

monsters_data.sensor_text: Blocks attacks with both arms.

monsters_data.name: bunyip
monsters_data.sensor_text: Covered by a hard shell. Piercing weapons are the way to go.

monsters_data.name: garm
monsters_data.sensor_text: Very nimble. Resistant to magic.
monsters_data.scan_text: Very nimble and hard to hit. Magic defense is also high. Defeat it quickly to avoid damage. It’s vulnerable to lightning and fire.

monsters_data.sensor_text: Aerial. Magic attacks are the way to go. Watch out for darkness.

monsters_data.name: snow flan
monsters_data.sensor_text: Ice elemental. Vulnerable to opposing element. Resistant to physical attacks.

monsters_data.name: bunyip
monsters_data.sensor_text: Covered by a hard shell. Piercing weapons are the way to go.

monsters_data.name: ochu
monsters_data.sensor_text: Vulnerable to fire.
monsters_data.scan_text: When HP is low, it performs Ochu Dance, which inflicts darkness, silence, confusion, and slow. Beware of its poison claws. Vulnerable to fire.

monsters_data.name: treasure chest
monsters_data.sensor_text: Steal to get the stuff inside.

monsters_data.name: extractor
monsters_data.sensor_text: Vulnerable to lightning.
monsters_data.scan_text: After rising, it releases Depth Charges, inflicting darkness and damage on Tidus and Wakka. Hurt it as much as you can to bring it back down.

altered_states.condition: While being Provoked, before Aqua Shooter is performed.
While being Provoked, after Extractor cools down.

monsters_data.name: aerouge
monsters_data.sensor_text: Aerial. Resistant to magic.
monsters_data.scan_text: Aerial and hard to hit. It’s weak against water, but has high magic defense. The only attack it has is Thundara, so inflict silence to leave it powerless.

monsters_data.name: buer

monsters_data.scan_text: Aerial and hard to hit. Its weakness is water, but it has high magic defense. Its Gaze may cause confusion.

monsters_data.name: gold element
monsters_data.sensor_text: Lightning elemental. Vulnerable to opposing element.
monsters_data.scan_text: Casts Thunder. Physical attacks hardly hurt it. Absorbs lightning, so use Watera for an Overkill.

monsters_data.name: iron giant
monsters_data.sensor_text: Dark Buster is effective, but beware its Reaper attack.
monsters_data.scan_text: Targets character with lowest HP. Beware its Reaper attack, which hits all characters. No elemental weaknesses. Takes half damage from lightning. Use piercing weapons and Dark Buster.

monsters_data.name: kusariqqu
monsters_data.sensor_text: Covered with hard scales. Piercing weapons are the way to go. Watch out for slow.
monsters_data.scan_text: Covered with hard scales. Physical and magic defense are high, but it’s weak against water. Its attack may cause slow. Watch out for its lightning- based Breath, which hits all.

monsters_data.name: larva
monsters_data.sensor_text: Casts Thundara on itself to replenish HP and grow even more powerful.
monsters_data.scan_text: When HP is halved, it casts Thundara on itself to recover HP and increase magic power. Silence it with Silence Attack. It’s vulnerable to water, so Watera is the way to go.

altered_states.condition: After hitting itself with Thundara for the first time.

After hitting itself with Thundara for the third time.

monsters_data.name: melusine

monsters_data.name: qactuar

monsters_data.name: blue element

monsters_data.scan_text: Casts Watera. Physical attacks hardly hurt it. Absorbs water, so Thundara is the way to go.

monsters_data.name: crawler

monsters_data.sensor_text: Disables magic and summoning. Attack it with items and Wakka’s ball.

monsters_data.name: seymour
monsters_data.sensor_text: Casts ice, lightning, water, and fire, in that order.
monsters_data.scan_text: Casts ice, lightning, water, and fire spells in that order, so have Yuna cast NulFrost, NulShock, NulTide, and NulBlaze. He’ll summon when cornered. Beware!

monsters_data.name: guado guardian
monsters_data.sensor_text: Protects Seymour.
monsters_data.scan_text: Attacks and defends with items, using Auto-Potion and confusion- inducing Shremedies. He restores Seymour’s HP too, so stop him from using items somehow.

monsters_data.name: anima
monsters_data.sensor_text: Goes into Overdrive when its gauge charges up.

monsters_data.name: guado guardian
monsters_data.sensor_text: Heals himself with Auto-Potion, so stop him from using items.
monsters_data.scan_text: Try to stop him from healing himself with Auto-Potion. He sometimes casts Berserk on other enemies, making them stronger.

monsters_data.name: wendigo
monsters_data.sensor_text: Only uses physical attacks. Curing its berserk status will lower its strength...

monsters_data.sensor_text: Heals himself with Auto-Potion, so stop him from using items.

monsters_data.sensor_text: Inflict darkness to evade its attacks.
monsters_data.scan_text: Its Gore is powerful, but inflict darkness or use Sleep Attack to avoid it easily. Kimahri can learn Fire Breath.

monsters_data.name: evil eye
monsters_data.sensor_text: Aerial creature with high magic defense. Beware of its confusion attack.
monsters_data.scan_text: Aerial and hard to hit. Vulnerable to fire, but has high magic defense. Its Gaze may cause confusion.

monsters_data.name: guado guardian
monsters_data.sensor_text: Tries to nullify Lulu’s magic.
monsters_data.scan_text: Controls fiends like Bombs and Chimeras. Tries to stop Lulu’s magic with Silence and Confuse. Hit him with Silence Attack first to leave him helpless.

monsters_data.name: evrae
monsters_data.sensor_text: Releases Poison Breath attack after inhaling.
monsters_data.scan_text: High magic defense. No elemental weaknesses. Exhales Poison Breath if hit repeatedly by melee attacks. Ask Cid to move the airship away and he’ll launch a volley of Guided Missiles for you.

altered_states.condition: When the Airship is far away.

monsters_data.name: warrior monk
monsters_data.sensor_text: Attacks single targets with rifle.
monsters_data.scan_text: St. Bevelle sentry and soldier of Yevon. Attacks single targets with his rifle. Sleep attacks are the way to go.

monsters_data.name: warrior monk
monsters_data.sensor_text: Attacks multiple targets with flamethrower.
monsters_data.scan_text: St. Bevelle sentry and soldier of Yevon. Attacks all targets with his flamethrower for fire-based damage. Sleep attacks are the way to go.

monsters_data.name: ykt-63
monsters_data.sensor_text: If it’s the last enemy standing, it will unleash a vicious Thrust Kick.
monsters_data.scan_text: Forbidden machina secretly used by Yevon. If it’s the last enemy standing, it throws a mean Thrust Kick that ejects the target from battle. Kimahri can learn Thrust Kick.

monsters_data.name: yat-99
monsters_data.sensor_text: Close in to melee range by defeating frontline enemies first.
monsters_data.scan_text: Forbidden machina secretly used by Yevon. Hits multiple targets when firing from a distance.

monsters_data.name: aqua flan
monsters_data.sensor_text: Water elemental. Vulnerable to opposing element. Resistant to physical attacks.
monsters_data.scan_text: Water-based. So soft, it’s hard to damage physically. Weak against lightning, so blast it with Thunder. Water attacks heal it, so avoid using them.

monsters_data.name: bat eye
monsters_data.sensor_text: Aerial. Resistant to magic.
monsters_data.scan_text: Aerial and hard to hit. Vulnerable to fire, but has high magic defense. Its Gaze can inflict confusion.

monsters_data.name: cave iguion
monsters_data.sensor_text: Very nimble. Resistant to magic.
monsters_data.scan_text: Very nimble and hard to hit. It has high magic defense and takes half damage from fire and water. Sometimes inflicts petrification and silence.

monsters_data.name: maze larva
monsters_data.sensor_text: Casts Watera on itself to replenish HP and grow even more powerful.
monsters_data.scan_text: When HP is halved, it casts Watera on itself to recover HP and raise magic power. Use Silence Attack to silence it. Vulnerable to lightning, so Thundaga is the way to go.

altered_states.condition: After hitting itself with Watera for the first time.
After hitting itself with Watera for the second time.
After hitting itself with Watera for the third time.

monsters_data.name: sahagin
monsters_data.sensor_text: Vulnerable to lightning. Slow on land.
monsters_data.scan_text: Although it’s slow on land, watch out for its Water Spurt. Vulnerable to lightning. Cripple it early by inflicting darkness or sleep on it.

monsters_data.name: swamp mafdet
monsters_data.sensor_text: Covered by a hard shell. Piercing weapons are the way to go. Watch out for slow.
monsters_data.scan_text: Covered by a hard shell. Slow-moving, but has high physical and magic defense. Vulnerable to lightning and ice. Its Bash sometimes inflicts slow.

monsters_data.name: octopus
monsters_data.sensor_text: Head is covered by a hard shell.
monsters_data.scan_text: Since it’s covered by a hard shell, piercing weapons are the way to go. Magic defense is low, and it’s also weak against lightning. Its attacks may inflict slow.

monsters_data.name: phlegyas
monsters_data.sensor_text: Watch out when it starts glowing. It releases Sonic Wave after the third pulse.
monsters_data.scan_text: It starts glowing when hit. After the 3rd pulse, it attacks with a Sonic Wave that hits all. Put it to sleep to prevent it from glowing. It takes only half damage from water. Weak against lightning.

monsters_data.name: remora
monsters_data.sensor_text: Watch out for Maelstrom.
monsters_data.scan_text: The more you attack it the sooner it casts Maelstrom. Takes half damage from water. Weak against lightning. Darkness and poison are the way to go.

monsters_data.name: sahagin
monsters_data.sensor_text: Vulnerable to lightning. Slow on land.
monsters_data.scan_text: Very nimble, but attacks are weak. HP is also low, so it’s no threat when it appears alone. Vulnerable to lightning. Cripple it early by inflicting darkness or sleep on it.

monsters_data.name: evrae altana
monsters_data.sensor_text: Weak against healing effects.
monsters_data.scan_text: Beware its Stone Gaze and nasty counterattacks. Open the gate locks to get some distance. Since it’s a zombie, healing magic and items are the way to go.

monsters_data.name: gate lock
monsters_data.sensor_text: Open the gate to escape.

monsters_data.name: seymour natus
monsters_data.sensor_text: Casts elemental magic, Break, and Flare.
monsters_data.scan_text: Still uses elemental magic, but now uses multi-spells. When HP is low he’ll petrify with Break and cast the non-elemental spell Flare.

monsters_data.name: mortibody
monsters_data.sensor_text: Watch out for their combo attacks.
monsters_data.scan_text: Its Shattering Claw hits petrified characters, smashing them to smithereens. Beware the Desperado, which inflicts damage and negates any magical augmentations.

monsters_data.name: anacondaur
monsters_data.sensor_text: Watch out for its Stone Gaze.
monsters_data.scan_text: The third eye’s Stone Gaze often causes petrification. After taking multiple hits, it retaliates with Sonic Tail, which strikes all. Kimahri can learn Stone Breath.

monsters_data.name: chimera brain
monsters_data.sensor_text: Darkness and silence work well. Vulnerable to Threaten.
monsters_data.scan_text: The snake casts lightning magic, the bull Assaults, the hawk uses Aqua Breath, and the lion uses Megiddo Flame, in that order. Vulnerable to Threaten, darkness, and silence. Kimahri can learn Aqua Breath.

altered_states.condition: Chimera Brain starts the battle with a random Agility stat. There are four possibilities, each having a 25% chance of occuring.
Chimera Brain starts the battle with a random Agility stat. There are four possibilities, each having a 25% chance of occuring.
Chimera Brain starts the battle with a random Agility stat. There are four possibilities, each having a 25% chance of occuring.

monsters_data.name: coeurl
monsters_data.sensor_text: Casts Drain and Blaster when low on HP.
monsters_data.scan_text: High magic attack and defense. Casts Thundara and Blizzara. Also casts Drain when HP is low. Beware of Blaster, since it’s unblockable and causes petrification.

monsters_data.name: flame flan
monsters_data.sensor_text: Fire elemental. Vulnerable to opposing element. Resistant to physical attacks.
monsters_data.scan_text: Fire-based. So soft, it’s hard to damage physically. Weak against ice, but absorbs HP from fire. Casts Firaga.

monsters_data.name: malboro
monsters_data.sensor_text: Watch out for its Bad Breath attack, which causes multiple status effects.
monsters_data.scan_text: Its Bad Breath inflicts multiple status effects on all characters. Guard against the status effects with armor, and attack with fire. Kimahri can learn Bad Breath.

monsters_data.name: mech scouter
monsters_data.sensor_text: Steal to inflict terminal malfunction.
monsters_data.scan_text: Higher HP and strength than the ones in the Sanubia Desert. Steal to cause a terminal malfunction.

monsters_data.name: mech scouter
monsters_data.sensor_text: Steal to inflict terminal malfunction.
monsters_data.scan_text: Higher HP and strength than the ones in the Sanubia Desert. Steal to cause a terminal malfunction.

monsters_data.name: nebiros
monsters_data.sensor_text: Aerial. Vulnerable to ice. Watch out for poison.
monsters_data.scan_text: Aerial and hard to hit. Magic attacks are effective. It’s vulnerable to ice, so cast Blizzaga to achieve Overkill. Attacks may inflict poison.

monsters_data.name: ogre
monsters_data.sensor_text: Be careful if it puts up its dukes.
monsters_data.scan_text: When it puts up its dukes, it will respond to physical attacks with a mighty counterattack. Fire-based attacks are the way to go.

monsters_data.name: shred
monsters_data.sensor_text: Covered by a hard shell. Piercing weapons are the way to go. Watch out for slow.
monsters_data.scan_text: Covered by a hard shell. Slow-moving, but has high physical and magic defense. Vulnerable to fire, but takes only half damage from other elements. Its Bash may inflict slow.

monsters_data.name: skoll
monsters_data.sensor_text: Very nimble. Resistant to magic. Watch out for sleep and silence.
monsters_data.scan_text: Very nimble and hard to hit. Magic defense is also high. Defeat it quickly to avoid damage. Vulnerable to fire and lightning. Its attacks may cause sleep and silence.

monsters_data.name: defender x
monsters_data.sensor_text: Made of stone. Resistant to physical attacks.
monsters_data.scan_text: Boasts very high physical attack and defense. Its counterattack Blast Punch delays target and causes damage. Casts Mighty Guard and Slowga.

monsters_data.name: dark element
monsters_data.sensor_text: No elemental weaknesses. Casts Reflect on itself.
monsters_data.scan_text: No elemental weaknesses, and physical attacks hardly hurt it. Casts Reflect on itself. If its Reflect is dispelled, it retaliates with Bio, Osmose, and Drain.

monsters_data.name: defender
monsters_data.sensor_text: Low magic defense.
monsters_data.scan_text: Strength and defense are high. There is a 1/2 chance of the monster using Haymaker, so be sure to raise your defense. Use magic often, since its magic defense is low.

monsters_data.name: epaaj
monsters_data.sensor_text: Watch out for poison.
monsters_data.scan_text: Very nimble. Its claws can inflict poison. Inflicting darkness or Threaten on it are the way to go.

monsters_data.name: ghost
monsters_data.notes: Fire, thunder, water, and ice affinities are different in every battle. Each can either be 'immune', 'halved', or 'weak'.
monsters_data.sensor_text: Casts Doom at the beginning of battle.
monsters_data.scan_text: Casts Doom at the beginning of battle. Defeat it before the countdown runs out to avoid KO. Its elemental weaknesses change every battle. Kimahri can learn Doom.

monsters_data.name: imp
monsters_data.sensor_text: Aerial. Resistant to magic.
monsters_data.scan_text: Aerial and hard to hit. It’s weak against water, but has high magic defense. The only attack it has is Thundaga, so inflict silence to leave it powerless.

monsters_data.name: magic urn middle eye
monsters_data.sensor_text: Hit the correct eye for prizes!
monsters_data.scan_text: Hit the correct target to win items. The wrong target ends the battle with a bang. Damage is substantial, so be sure to heal. Seven fabulous prizes in all, while supplies last.

other_items.condition: The middle eye is targeted by a single target attack (except 'Steal', 'Mug', and Self Destruct'. It then has a 60% chance of giving you an item. The eye can only be attacked once.

monsters_data.name: magic urn outer eyes
monsters_data.sensor_text: Hit the correct eye for prizes!
monsters_data.scan_text: Hit the correct target to win items. The wrong target ends the battle with a bang. Damage is substantial, so be sure to heal. Seven fabulous prizes in all, while supplies last.

other_items.condition: The outer eyes are targeted by a single target attack (except 'Steal', 'Mug', and Self Destruct'. It then has an 88% chance of giving you an item. Each eye can only be attacked once.

monsters_data.name: mech hunter
monsters_data.sensor_text: Steal to inflict terminal malfunction.
monsters_data.scan_text: Higher HP and strength than the ones in the Sanubia Desert. Steal to cause a terminal malfunction.

monsters_data.name: nidhogg
monsters_data.sensor_text: Covered with hard scales. Piercing weapons are the way to go. Watch out for slow.
monsters_data.scan_text: Covered with hard scales. Physical and magic defense are high. It only takes half damage from fire, but it’s weak against ice. Its attack may cause slow. Beware of its fire-based Breath, which hits all.

monsters_data.name: thorn
monsters_data.sensor_text: Counters physical attacks with Pollen, which induces sleep and darkness.
monsters_data.scan_text: Casts Fira. Putting it to sleep is effective. Releases sleep- and darkness- inducing Pollen when hit by a weapon. Vulnerable to fire.

monsters_data.name: tonberry
monsters_data.sensor_text: Advances closer four times. Defeat it before then, or else...
monsters_data.scan_text: After four waddles, he stabs with his Chef’s Knife. His counterattack Karma deals damage based on the number of enemies that character has defeated.

monsters_data.name: valaha
monsters_data.sensor_text: Inflict darkness to evade its attacks.
monsters_data.scan_text: Inflict darkness to hinder its attacks. Its Flame Ball is a powerful fire attack that hits all, but it needs to Charge before it’s released. Kimahri can learn Fire Breath.

monsters_data.name: yowie
monsters_data.sensor_text: Very nimble. Resistant to magic. Watch out for petrification and silence.
monsters_data.scan_text: Very nimble and hard to hit. Magic defense is also high. Takes only half damage from fire, lightning, and water. Attacks may cause petrification and silence.

monsters_data.name: biran ronso
monsters_data.notes: HP, Strength, Magic, and Agility depend on Kimahri's HP, Strength, Magic, Agility. Listed are the minimum possible stats based on Kimahri's base stats.
monsters_data.sensor_text: Covers Yenke when together.
monsters_data.scan_text: Blocks attacks on Yenke with Guard, except when separated after performing a Bulldoze. Casts Mighty Guard just once after losing HP. Kimahri can learn many techniques.

monsters_data.name: yenke ronso
monsters_data.notes: HP, Strength, Magic, and Agility depend on Kimahri's HP, Strength, Magic, Agility. Listed are the minimum possible stats based on Kimahri's base stats.
monsters_data.sensor_text: Covers Biran when together.
monsters_data.scan_text: Blocks attacks on Biran with Guard, except when separated after performing a Bulldoze. Casts White Wind just once after losing HP. Kimahri can learn many techniques.

monsters_data.name: achelous
monsters_data.sensor_text: Watch out when it starts glowing. It releases Sonic Wave after the third pulse.
monsters_data.scan_text: It starts glowing when hit. After the 3rd pulse, it attacks with a Sonic Wave. Put it to sleep to prevent it from glowing. It takes no damage from water, but is weak against lightning.

monsters_data.name: ahriman
monsters_data.sensor_text: Aerial. Resistant to magic. Watch out for confusion.
monsters_data.scan_text: Aerial and hard to hit. It has high magic defense and no elemental weaknesses. Its Gaze may cause confusion. It also has Ultrasonics, which strikes all characters.

monsters_data.name: bandersnatch
monsters_data.sensor_text: Very nimble. Resistant to magic. Watch out for sleep and silence.
monsters_data.scan_text: Very nimble and hard to hit. Magic defense is also high. Defeat it quickly to avoid damage. Vulnerable to fire. Its attacks may cause sleep and silence.

monsters_data.name: bashura
monsters_data.sensor_text: Be careful if it puts up its dukes.
monsters_data.scan_text: When it puts up its dukes, it will respond to physical attacks with a mighty counter. Use magic and poison to soften it up.

monsters_data.name: behemoth
monsters_data.sensor_text: Watch out for Heave.
monsters_data.scan_text: Its Thundara, Heave, and claw attacks are deadly. One good hit will knock you out. Kimahri can learn Mighty Guard.

monsters_data.name: dark flan
monsters_data.sensor_text: No elemental weaknesses. Resistant to physical attacks.
monsters_data.scan_text: Resistant to physical attacks and cuts all elemental damage by half. Casts non-elemental magic like Demi, Bio, Flare, Osmose, and Drain. Kimahri can learn White Wind.

monsters_data.name: grat
monsters_data.sensor_text: Vulnerable to fire.
monsters_data.scan_text: Its Seed Cannon packs quite a punch. Seed Burst doesn’t do much damage, but may inflict confusion on characters. Vulnerable to fire. Kimahri can learn Seed Cannon.

monsters_data.name: grenade
monsters_data.sensor_text: Retaliates with Self-Destruct when attacked three times.
monsters_data.scan_text: Retaliates with Self-Destruct against whoever attacks it a third time. Weak against ice, but has high magic defense, so use Mental Break and your best ice magic. Kimahri can learn Self-Destruct.

monsters_data.name: grendel
monsters_data.sensor_text: Inflict darkness to evade its attacks. Piercing weapons are the way to go.
monsters_data.scan_text: Inflict darkness to hinder its attacks. Its Flame Ball is a powerful fire attack that hits all, but it needs to Charge before it’s released. Use poison and piercing weapons. Kimahri can learn Fire Breath.

monsters_data.name: maelspike
monsters_data.sensor_text: Watch out for Maelstrom.
monsters_data.scan_text: The more you attack it the sooner it casts Maelstrom. Immune to water and weak against lightning. Darkness and poison are the way to go.

monsters_data.name: mandragora
monsters_data.sensor_text: Vulnerable to fire.
monsters_data.scan_text: The more damage it takes, the sooner it uses Earthquake. Its Ochu Dance inflicts darkness, silence, confusion, and slow. Also beware of poison. Vulnerable to fire.

monsters_data.name: mech defender
monsters_data.sensor_text: Steal to inflict terminal malfunction.
monsters_data.scan_text: Abandoned machina from ages past. Higher HP and defense than the Mech Leader. Steal to cause a terminal malfunction.

monsters_data.name: mech leader
monsters_data.sensor_text: Steal to inflict terminal malfunction.
monsters_data.scan_text: Abandoned machina from ages past. Its Electrocute attack inflicts severe lightning damage. Steal to terminate immediately.

monsters_data.name: splasher x1
monsters_data.sensor_text: Watch out for Self-Destruct.
monsters_data.scan_text: When defeated, it sometimes inflicts damage on its attacker with Self-Destruct.

monsters_data.name: splasher x2
monsters_data.sensor_text: Watch out for poison.
monsters_data.scan_text: Acts in pairs. May inflict poison when it bites.

monsters_data.name: splasher x3
monsters_data.sensor_text: Watch out for poison.
monsters_data.scan_text: Acts in groups of three. May inflict poison when it bites.

monsters_data.name: seymour flux
monsters_data.sensor_text: Watch out for their combo attacks.
monsters_data.scan_text: Predict the Mortiorchis’s actions by watching Seymour’s. His Lance of Atrophy causes zombie, and the Mortiorchis follows with Full-Life. Together they unleash Total Annihilation.

monsters_data.name: mortiorchis
monsters_data.sensor_text: Watch out for their combo attacks.
monsters_data.scan_text: Beware its combo attacks. If a character is zombified by Seymour’s Lance of Atrophy, it will cast Full-Life, causing instant KO. Use Protect to help survive the Cross Cleave.

monsters_data.name: sanctuary keeper
monsters_data.sensor_text: High physical and magic defense.
monsters_data.scan_text: Its Photon Wings attack causes confusion, sleep, silence, darkness, curse, and other status effects. Tail Sweep negates Haste and delays targets’ next turn. Uses healing magic and Reflect, among other spells.

monsters_data.name: fallen monk
monsters_data.sensor_text: Zombie. Vulnerable to healing magic and items.
monsters_data.scan_text: A soldier who continues to protect the Yevon Dome even after death. His rifle hits single targets. He can inflict zombie status, so watch out.

monsters_data.name: fallen monk
monsters_data.sensor_text: Zombie. Vulnerable to healing magic and items.
monsters_data.scan_text: A soldier who continues to protect the Yevon Dome even after death. Attacks all targets with his flamethrower for fire-based damage.

monsters_data.name: defender z
monsters_data.sensor_text: Mental Break works well.
monsters_data.scan_text: Strength, physical, and magic defense are high. There is a 1/2 chance of the monster using Haymaker. When HP is low, it also releases Blast Punch, which delays turns.

monsters_data.name: yat-97
monsters_data.sensor_text: Close in to melee range by defeating frontline enemies first.
monsters_data.scan_text: Hits multiple targets when firing from a distance. Immune to delay skills.

monsters_data.name: ykt-11
monsters_data.sensor_text: If it’s the last enemy standing, it will unleash a vicious Thrust Kick.
monsters_data.scan_text: If it’s the last enemy standing, it throws a mean Thrust Kick that ejects the target from battle. Immune to delay techniques. Kimahri can learn Thrust Kick.

monsters_data.name: spectral keeper
monsters_data.sensor_text: Attacks all frontal targets when hit. Use trigger command Move to get out of the way.
monsters_data.scan_text: Attacks all frontal targets when hit. It will plant a Glyph Mine upon a circle, causing instant KO when detonated. Use the trigger command Move to transfer to another circle.

monsters_data.name: circle
monsters_data.sensor_text: Each magic circle can support one character.

monsters_data.name: yunalesca
monsters_data.sensor_text: Reaper of souls. Vulnerable to holy magic.
monsters_data.scan_text: Casts Curaga and Regen on zombified characters. Cure zombie with Holy Water. Her counterattacks dispel support magic. She also curses aeons with her Mind Blast.

monsters_data.name: left fin
monsters_data.sensor_text: Gathers energy to cast Gravija. Avoid with trigger command Pull Back.
monsters_data.scan_text: Unleashes Gravija once the core is energized, reducing all characters’ HP by 3/4. To avoid this, get Cid to back off. Dispels with Negation and sometimes attacks all with a physical attack.

monsters_data.name: right fin
monsters_data.sensor_text: Gathers energy to cast Gravija. Avoid with trigger command Pull Back.
monsters_data.scan_text: Unleashes Gravija once the core is energized, reducing all characters’ HP by 3/4. To avoid this, get Cid to back off. Dispels with Negation and sometimes attacks all with a physical attack.

monsters_data.name: sinspawn genais
monsters_data.sensor_text: Absorbs magical attacks against Sin.
monsters_data.scan_text: After losing half its HP, it enters its shell on its next turn. If hit there, it recovers with Cura and exits the shell on its next turn. Protected from Gravija when inside the shell.

monsters_data.name: sin core
monsters_data.sensor_text: Gathers energy when Genais enters its shell.
monsters_data.scan_text: When Genais enters its shell, the core begins to energize, unleashing Gravija, which reduces the HP of all targets by 3/4. Also dispels positive status effects with Negation.

monsters_data.name: overdrive sin
monsters_data.sensor_text: Finish him before he opens his mouth all the way.
monsters_data.scan_text: Pulls the airship in while gathering all his strength to cast the ultimate terror, Giga-Graviton. Stop him before he wipes everyone out!

monsters_data.name: adamantoise
monsters_data.sensor_text: Covered by a hard shell.
monsters_data.scan_text: Protected by a hard shell. Attacks mutliple targets with its fire-based Breath. Armor Break and Mental Break are the way to go.

monsters_data.name: barbatos
monsters_data.sensor_text: Protected by tough armor. Try Armor Break.
monsters_data.scan_text: Covered in thick armor. Armor Break works well, but watch out for a powerful counterattack. All of its attacks deal great damage, so beware.

monsters_data.name: behemoth king
monsters_data.sensor_text: Retaliates with Meteor when defeated.
monsters_data.scan_text: Its claws, lightning, and Heave attacks are deadly. Watch out for the Meteor it casts before it dies. Cast Protect, or defend with the  button to survive. Kimahri can learn Mighty Guard.

monsters_data.name: demonolith
monsters_data.sensor_text: Beware of its Breath, which can petrify you.
monsters_data.scan_text: Beware of its Pharaoh’s Curse, which inflicts poison, silence, darkness, and curse. If attacked when petrified, the party member will be unable to return to battle. Also watch out for zombie.

monsters_data.name: exoray
monsters_data.sensor_text: Counters physical attacks with Pollen, which induces poison, silence, and darkness.
monsters_data.scan_text: Casts Firaga. Silence is the way to go. Releases poison-, silence-, and darkness-inducing Pollen when hit by a weapon. Vulnerable to fire.

monsters_data.name: gemini
monsters_data.sensor_text: Together they unleash Double Reaper. Focus your attacks to defeat one quickly.
monsters_data.scan_text: After receiving a certain amount of damage, they unleash a powerful synchronized attack, the Double Reaper. One absorbs lightning and fire, while the other absorbs water and ice.

monsters_data.name: gemini
monsters_data.sensor_text: Together they unleash Double Reaper. Focus your attacks to defeat one quickly.
monsters_data.scan_text: After receiving a certain amount of damage, they unleash a powerful synchronized attack, the Double Reaper. One absorbs lightning and fire, while the other absorbs water and ice.

monsters_data.name: great malboro
monsters_data.sensor_text: Breathes Bad Breath 1/3 of the time. Be ready for anything.
monsters_data.scan_text: Danger! There is a 1/3 chance of it attacking with Bad Breath. To avoid being wiped out, equip armor that guards against status effects and attack with fire. Kimahri can learn Bad Breath.

monsters_data.name: land worm
monsters_data.sensor_text: Watch out for Earthquake, which hits all.  It’ll be a long battle, so keep an eye on your HP.
monsters_data.scan_text: Beware of its Earthquake, which hits all. Inflict sleep and darkness on it to hinder its attacks. Both its physical and magic defense are high, so use Armor Break and Mental Break.

monsters_data.name: wraith
monsters_data.notes: Fire, thunder, water, and ice affinities are different in every battle. Each can either be 'absorb', 'immune', 'halved', or 'weak'.
monsters_data.sensor_text: Casts Doom at the beginning of battle.
monsters_data.scan_text: Elemental strengths/weaknesses are different each encounter. Casts Doom in battle. If nobody is Doomed, it may unleash Death, so watch out. Kimahri can learn Doom.

monsters_data.name: seymour omnis
monsters_data.notes: Element Affinities are dependant on how many element symbols he is connected to. 0 = 'Neutral', 1 = 'Halved', 2 = 'Immune', 3 = 'Absorb', 4 = 'Absorb' + 'Weak' to opposing element.
monsters_data.sensor_text: Energized by the Mortiphasms.
monsters_data.scan_text: Casts spells once energized by the four Mortiphasms behind him. Their positions somehow affect his actions. Physical attacks turn the Mortiphasms to the left, while magic turns them to the right.

monsters_data.name: braskas final aeon
monsters_data.sensor_text: Use the trigger command to talk.
monsters_data.scan_text: Draws power from the Yu Pagodas and unleashes Overdrive attacks once his gauge is charged. Stop him from using Overdrives. Have Tidus talk to lower the gauge.

monsters_data.name: yu pagoda
monsters_data.notes: Max HP is set depending on how much damage it receives in total before it dies. The default is 5000.
monsters_data.sensor_text: Inflict damage to halt its actions.

monsters_data.name: yu pagoda
monsters_data.notes: Max HP is set depending on how much damage it receives in total before it dies. The default is 5000.
monsters_data.sensor_text: Inflict damage to halt its actions.

monsters_data.name: master coeurl
monsters_data.sensor_text: Casts Drain, Confusion, and Blaster when low on HP.
monsters_data.scan_text: High magic attack and defense. Casts Thundaga and Blizzaga. Also casts Drain and Confuse when HP is low. Beware of Blaster, since it’s unblockable and causes instant death.

monsters_data.name: master tonberry
monsters_data.sensor_text: Advances closer four times. Defeat it before then, or else...
monsters_data.scan_text: After four waddles, he stabs with his Chef’s Knife. His counterattack Karma deals damage based on the number of enemies that character has defeated.

monsters_data.name: varuna
monsters_data.sensor_text: Resistant to all four elements.
monsters_data.scan_text: Casts Haste on himself and attacks with magic, so use Dispel on him. After his Mana Focus, he’ll cast Emblem of Fate. You can reduce damage with Shell, but he can cast Dispel on you, too.
